title: Baron Davis has a Business Blueprint for Athletes
itunes:title: Baron Davis has a Business Blueprint for Athletes
description:
NBA All Star Baron Davis made an impact on the league, but his longest-lasting contributions have arguably come off the court. Starting with an inspired (and lucrative) early investment in Vitaminwater, Davis has become the model for the modern athlete-as-businessman. In conversation with Jason, Mike and Michael, Davis lays out his vision for empowering others through an ever-growing platform. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
